Reason: The configuration option 'memtable_offheap_space_in_mb' is performance-sensitive. This is because the value of 'memtable_offheap_space_in_mb' directly affects the off-heap memory limit for memtables in the system. The 'offHeapLimit' variable in the 'createMemtableAllocatorPool()' method is set based on this configuration parameter, which in turn affects the memory consumption of the system. Any changes in 'memtable_offheap_space_in_mb' can lead to notable performance variations at the system level, making it a performance-sensitive configuration.
